name: quickbooks-mcp
description: Multi-tenant QuickBooks Online integration for Claude Desktop with centralized token management
author: QuickBooks MCP Team

brokerApiUrl.title: Token Broker URL
brokerApiUrl.description: URL of your QuickBooks token broker service (e.g., https://qb-broker.example.com)

brokerApiToken.title: Broker API Token
brokerApiToken.description: Your authentication token for the broker service

defaultCompany.title: Default Company (Optional)
defaultCompany.description: Default QuickBooks company name or ID to use when not specified

cacheTTL.title: Cache Duration (hours)
cacheTTL.description: How long to cache company data locally (reduces API calls)

enableDebugLogging.title: Enable Debug Logging
enableDebugLogging.description: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting (logs to stderr)
